Both are located in the library in the 3rd section of Neriak.. The library is near the clerics guild...

Vumar
----- Original Message -----
From: Marc & Heather McGill
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Sent: Tuesday, June 01, 1999 7:34 PM
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] [Spells]--Location of


Can someone please help a girl in need? I am looking for the following 2 Magician spells: 8th level-- DIMENSIONAL POCKET and 12th level--SUMMON FANG. I would appreciate it if someone could please tell me where to go to buy them.
Crimsin { Dark Elf Magician / Rallos Zek }
